Reviews.Title: LG32in TV
Reviews.Author: Rolana Schmidt "sugar baby"
Reviews.Content: I really like this Tv easy to set up easy to understand instructions.  Has good sound and color.  And unlike the cheaper Tvs you can get parts if needed which hopefully never will. All over good TV good value.

Reviews.Title: So far pretty great
Reviews.Author: Anton Matytsin
Reviews.Content: This is my first HDTV. I got it on sale from Amazon after considering a number of options and I am pretty happy with it. I especially like the fact that the screen can turn easily, so I can watch it from different parts of the room.I am not a videomaniac, but the picture quality is great. This tv is definitely a good deal.

Reviews.Title: great television
Reviews.Author: Jose "Average guy"
Reviews.Content: Great tv,  It is a very good picture for the price.  Only negative is the sound quaility, I have to turn it up very loud to hear.  If you are adding a surround system it won't be a problem.  I highly recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: rx_sleepy
Reviews.Content: I have had no problems in the month I have had this TV! It came from Amazon a few days before I expected it, it only took 3 days on regular shipping!  I see no issues with the TV except that the glossy black finish glares.  The sound is much better than most flat screens when in clear-voice mode!

Reviews.Title: Great lcd to use as computer/gaming monitor
Reviews.Author: sess882
Reviews.Content: This is my second hdtv and so far so good.  It doesn't have all the bells and whistles that some of the higher end lcd's have, but for the price it is an excellent tv.  I see the price has gone up on the tv as well since I purchased it, probably due to the fact its being sold by target now.  Any event... like I said its a great tv.  I'm using it almost exclusively as a computer monitor and the resolution via the hdmi or dvi is superb.  Very bright and easy to see in a sunlit room.  I really enjoy the different AV modes the tv has as well.  While I still kind of wish I would have went with a tv with a bit higher refresh rate because I do use it for gaming as well.  Although I really only get the slightest of motion blur when using it with my Xbox 360, its hardly noticeable unlike some of the other reviews on this say.  Sure if you go from a 240hz or 120hz of course your going to notice a bit of motion blur, its a no brainer.  But people love to complain and their opinions make the world go round...I was most impressed by the sound on this tv as well.  I don't know what LG is doing with their speakers but hopefully they keep it up.  The trim on the tv is pretty nice as well.  Not as nice as Samsung's touch of color panels, but its sweet.Great tv, great as a computer monitor, great for gaming, great for watching hockey... Go pens... philly stinks.

Reviews.Title: GREAT BUY
Reviews.Author: Ms Lee "Ms Lee"
Reviews.Content: I was a little nervous about buying a television online. Buying a visual medium without actually seeing it could give you pause. From the very beginning My fears were put to rest. First of all, amazingly, I recieved the set the next day after ordering it. I've never gotten anything from Amazon that fast. It came, and was very easy to set up, and the picture was gorgeous. I had read some of the other reviews which talked about sound quality. That has not been an issue with me. Both the sound and picuture are very good. I do notice a variation in sound going from different mediums, tivo,dvd etc. but with the price, this tv can't be beat. Especially since for some reason, most 32 inch sets are now only 720, and this is 1080p.

Reviews.Title: LG 32 I like it
Reviews.Author: Christopher W. King
Reviews.Content: It is a very good tv/monitor for my small space. It boots fast and controls are rational.

Reviews.Title: Good Value
Reviews.Author: John Anderson
Reviews.Content: Overall I am pleased with this selection.  Picture and sound are both good.  Set up was very easy.  Only down side is that audio output is limited to a single optical connection, which can make hookup to external sound system a problem.

Reviews.Title: Great Television. First-timers should start here for sure!
Reviews.Author: Stephen P Nobles IV
Reviews.Content: This unit is the second unit from LG I have owned. I have this unit and a 37" model of the same family of units. It's a great all-around unit. Sound is surprisingly louder than I thought it would be. Simply blows away any monitor with a similar speaker setup. HD quality is solid. Games look gorgeous, Blu-rays look and sound incredible. If you're a first time HD buyer, this unit is what you'd be after to get your feet wet. While it does lack features many latest & greatest models have(Streaming, 3-D, using media from a USB Thumbdrive, etc.) it doesn't need those if all you're interested in is a nice picture and a great price point. I paid less than the $500-ish asked, so if you're paying this much or more, this may be priced out of its target market.Menu selection can be a bit confusing but once you get a feel for it, you can browse things in a flash within the menu system. A better tag system would have been nice for the various inputs. I'd love to label composite as my "Wii" connection, HDMI1 for Xbox 360, and HDMI2 for PS3, but they DO manage comparable labels to make it easy enough to identify each specific unit hooked-in.(PS3 is currently Blu-Ray, 360 is PC since I use the VGA cable, and Wii is just tagged Game)If you can snag this in the sub $450 range, jump post-haste.

Reviews.Title: Excellent TV at a great price
Reviews.Author: K. Marashi
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV on sale about a month or so ago and even though I picked ground shipping it was at my door next morning. I got this for the bedroom and I have this TV plugged in to my PS3 and my PC and i get excellent quality with both. Very happy with my purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: Awesome purchase!
Reviews.Author: ckasler "Catherine"
Reviews.Content: I would reccomend this tv to anyone. We bought it to replace a dead one and we love it. It is the main television in our home and we watch local channels, movies, and sports. They all look great! I would definitly purchase it again!

Reviews.Title: You cant go wrong!!
Reviews.Author: Elisa Flores "Elisa77"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this as a "Today's Deal" last month because I couldnt beat the price of $379!  I looked at Best Buy for same product and it was $599!  This is an awesome TV and would recommend it to anyone.  I have a small living room and its perfect, anything bigger would over-dominate the room and my eyes!  Its great for a small living room or even a bedroom.

Reviews.Title: A Great HDTV
Reviews.Author: W. Stubbs "Computer Burt"
Reviews.Content: After looking at the 32 inch LCD HDTV reviews at Amazon and other sellers, I decided to purchase this LG. It arrived quickly and safely via UPS. The picture is simply perfect on HD cable channels or the attached 1080i DVD/VCR, both connected via HDMI cables. In fact, the picture is superb on non-HD cable channels!  Extensive comparison shopping showed that Amazon had the best price and super fast, free shipping!If this weren't installed in our bedroom, I could be a little disappointed with the TV's limited viewing angle. If your situation requires a fairly wide viewing angle, I'd recommend another TV. Viewed from our bed, however, it is perfect - just what we wanted!

Reviews.Title: LG1080 32" flat screen tv
Reviews.Author: Matt K "Matt"
Reviews.Content: I have had this LG flat screen 32 inch 1080 HDTV for about a month and am finding it easy to use and with a great picture.Unfortunately my condominium does not yet have high def, but I also bought a Blu-Ray player and can attest to the fabulous high definition picture that the LG television gives to BluRay discs.

Reviews.Title: great tv for the price and my use
Reviews.Author: Aaron C. Weekley "aaron"
Reviews.Content: i bought this tv for the bedroom.  i think it is great.  i know there are nicer tv's out there, but for a 32" tv, for a bedroom, i didn't have much reason to buy the nicest thing on the market.  this tv is great, especially for the price.  hd channels look great on it.  the bedroom is a darker room and i mostly watch it at night, so i can't comment on the picture in a well lit space.  sound quality seems fine for basic tv watching.  a backlit remote would be great for watching in a dark room, but not a must.  you get used to where the buttons are pretty quickly.  i would reccomend this tv.

Reviews.Title: WRONG width on the specs listed on the page
Reviews.Author: Anthony cruz "pointer165"
Reviews.Content: this TV is NOT 31.5 inches wide but 32 inches!!...now for most people that means nothing but for me it is an exact measurement to have this fit into the armoire and close the doors! I do not want to look at a TV when I walk into my apartment. This is a replacement of a JVC that was alot smaller and alot more expensive that was 4 years old, so the only solution is to put it into the armoire at an ANGLE and close the doors..thank god I have the room or else I would have returned it...beautiful picture but I knew that from seeing a neighbor's LG that's much bigger but this one is newer than her's...I love the LG label..it is QUALITY ..I own a fridge/freezer & a microwave by LG

Reviews.Title: Sound Sync
Reviews.Author: Granny Jane "GJ"
Reviews.Content: Love the TV, great picture, fabulous deal on Amazon.  However, can anyone tell me why TV sound is not in sync with external speakers and TV 2 in another room?  I am using a Dish HDTV receiver, cannot get sound to synchronize with LG32LH30.  Any help will be greatly appreciated, really want to keep this TV.

Reviews.Title: WOW!
Reviews.Author: Czar16M.D.
Reviews.Content: Great T.V.! The deal at amazon with this great product! WOW! I've had this t.v. for about a month now and all i can say is that for a t.v. worth under $500, damn great deal. a month before that, i bought a 52inch Sony xbr, it was pricey but compared to lg 32lh30, not much of a noticeable difference in picture quality except for a few lags and slight smoothness. I mean unless your a videofile, youd really notice it, but if you've just gotten home from a hard days work and want to unwind by watching a blue ray film or an HD tv program, hell, you will be satisfied! I love the invisible speakers and the sound quality is great! design wise, it's plain although the LED power display gives it a bit of a distinction and a hint of elegance. It lacks,the internet connections, net flicks, additional software, etc that the xbr has but hell, that's what a computer is for. I did hook up my laptop via hdmi cable to this T.V. and the movie quality as well as streaming was just as good. So overall, for the price amazon is offering (LG site has it at $649.99) it's a hell of a deal! you cant go wrong with this purchase, specially with the free delivery tops it all off! Go buy it at Amazon! they've been great so far!

Reviews.Title: I love this TV!
Reviews.Author: BEV
Reviews.Content: I would have purchased a larger tv if I wasn't limited to the size of really nice entertainment center I didn't want to "repurpose."  I researched several brands for customer satisfaction and cost and got a great product in the LH30.  I'm not a technology buff and I haven't hooked up any peripherals to it (I use a tv the old fashioned way - I watch what's on it and dvd's)so I can't comment on that. But for anyone who just wants an easy to use tv - the set-up menus are very user-friendly - I recommend it.  The hd picture is fabulous!

Reviews.Title: Awesome color and Brightness
Reviews.Author: rtom
Reviews.Content: This TV has awesome color and brightness. It has all the inputs you need and a hidden usb port that can be turned on (disabled by default). The 1080p resolution is perfect, and the size is perfect for any bedroom,small living room, or play room. The stand is elegant and the setup is pretty simple, but you can do some cool custom stuff if you need that.

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Larry A
Reviews.Content: Excellent TV. Paid $379.99 for a 32" 1080P LCD TV on Amazon's deal of the day, that's less than it would cost for a 720P. I went to price this TV at Best Buy. It was on sale ther for $549.99, normally $599.99. Setup was very easy and the picture is terrific. Good sound. I would recommend this TV very highly.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: Ricky R. Mann "vwbugman"
Reviews.Content: After a lot of searching, I settled on this TV from Amazon.  I got a great price, fast shipping and no headaches.  The picture is great especially in HD.  I use it in the bedroom and couldn't be happier.  I also purchased an extended warranty with squaretrade to insure it for a total of 3 years.  The only negative is I wish it had an SVH plugin .  Other than that, very happy.

Reviews.Title: Love My LG :)
Reviews.Author: Terri Orange
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen and was hesitant to buy since my old clunker worked just fine. The price was too good to pass up. This TV is easy to use and fits perfectly in my small living room. Pulled it out of the box and set it up in no time. Simple!! Clarity is much better than expected and sound quality is great.  The menus are easy to scroll through.  I love watching my shows on my new, big, colorful screen. Definitely worth the purchase!  Not sure how I lived without it!

Reviews.Title: LG 32LH30 32-Inch 1080p LCD
Reviews.Author: Kristopher A. Kronbach "ToledoBirdman"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product from Tiger Direct for $449 in late November and once plugged in I was totally amazed at the picture quality and ease of operation. The menu bar is so easy to work with that a two-year old can adjust it easily. I have read some reviews complaining about the picture skipping. All you need to do is press the menu bar, go to picture and click the picture wizard, problem solved. Much better than the Sony I have in my bedroom. I recommend this to anyone. Make sure to get a HD box to get the full vividness of this amazing TV. I am stunned.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jan
Reviews.Content: After a lot of research for a new bedroom tv, I purchased this LG and couldn't be happier. Out-of-the-box perfect, easy to setup and an amazing picture with tons of features. This is the second LG TV we recently purchased and I'm sure it won't be the last!

Reviews.Title: LG 32LH30
Reviews.Author: Robert
Reviews.Content: Great T.V. at a good price. I'm sure you have already read a bunch of other reviews so i won't even bother.You can't go wrong with this T.V.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LH30
Reviews.Author: K. Settle
Reviews.Content: Purchased this item after reading reviews from [...] and comparisons from other Manufacturers....found this to be the best value. I feel i have made a good choice for our bedroom TV. 1080p with directv on Planet earth is awesome. Now I would rather watch my shows in the bedroom than our Sharp Aquos 720p in the living room.

Reviews.Title: great and good looking
Reviews.Author: Joseph A Keenan
Reviews.Content: this is an easy one... great flat screen,great price,, Amazon makes it very easy... it showed up fast as well!

Reviews.Title: I love this TV
Reviews.Author: J. Johnson
Reviews.Content: I find this product better than expected with ease of use and sharp clear picture. it was a good price and all in all I have no complaintsJanet

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: World Traveller "S"
Reviews.Content: Item was received within 24 hours of ordering! Super fast, and in good condition.Is easy to assemble, and to operate.Nice slim line model, modern and chique, and not heavy.Good picture and sound quality.(Note - website did not specify if power input could be 120-240 v or not, present cables are for 120 v only. Reviews.Title: Love my HD
Reviews.Author: K. Zaccaria
Reviews.Content: Couldn't be more pleased. Great picture, great sound.  Perfect size for smaller family room

Reviews.Title: Now we want to replace our other TV!
Reviews.Author: Janet Strong
Reviews.Content: Arrived almost before we finished ordering it!  Easy to set up (attach base, plug in power and cable) and we were all set.  Option to manually or automatically program.  We chose the auto.  LG is simply great!

Reviews.Title: Great for gaming too
Reviews.Author: J. "J."
Reviews.Content: Okay, here you go, long story but true.  We bought a LG, 120 Hz, 1080p tv for the Xbox gaming and it has a massive delay.  Absolutely could not play Guitar Hero or Rock band and got crushed in Call of Duty.  We tried everything, calibrated the Xbox, calibrated the games, brought a friends Xbox over, changed cords, called LG directly, searched the internet...no luck.  Hooked it up to a little travel TV we had, no delay.  We called Best Buy, where we bought the TV...good folks by the way.  And told them the problem.  They didn't believe us, so we brought the TV, the Xbox and the drum set into the store and showed them.  The were blown away.  We asked if we could move from TV to TV to try and find one without a delay.  Delays were everywhere except this TV and a Samsung.  Went to buy this TV and it was out of stock.  So, had to turn in the old one and buy this one.  If you'll notice this one 60 HZ vice 120 HZ and that is the only thing we could see was different.  Anyway, this TV is great.

Reviews.Title: out of stock in amazon
Reviews.Author: Carlos Ospina
Reviews.Content: I was about to buy this tv from amazon when it was 429.99, but when i finally got the money it was no longer avalaible, the worst part is the newr model is 599.99 and not avalaible neither... ahh well...

Reviews.Title: Great Value and Quality
Reviews.Author: Gepetto
Reviews.Content: We just installed this TV in our lake home.  It was truly "plug and play" as they say in the computer industry.  My grandsons (12 and 8 years old) unpackaged it, installed the base, plugged it in, ran the auto channel program routine and when we returned it was already tuned in to our favorite channel.  How did it know?  The picture is excelent providing a vivid high def image.  You won't regret this purchase.

Reviews.Title: Good bargain
Reviews.Author: Derek Lei
Reviews.Content: other reviews are really useful already, the only thing I want to add is that the plastic chrome casing gets dusty really fast. I don't know why, but the plastic has some crazy static electricity to it that attracts dust, to the point where it's visible in a day or two if you don't wipe it.

Reviews.Title: Great price great TV
Reviews.Author: Long B. Thai "lbthaiamazon"
Reviews.Content: We snatched this TV up during the Amazon deal of the day for only 379 - at this price this tv was a steal for a 1080p tv (especially with free shipping and no sales tax!).  We've hooked it up to our Comcast digital cable, our PC, and our Xbox 360 and the TV performs like a champ.  The 1080p and the super high contrast ratio makes for great visuals when HD video comes through.  The PC input is really handy as it gives new life to our old desktop by now being able to surf in 32" of glorious resolution.  There's plenty HDMI inputs and the composite inputs are good too.  My only complaint is that the sound is so-so, but it is adequate.  If you really, want good sound, you are probably going to invest in a sound system anyways, so the tv sound isn't really an issue.  It's a very good tv and a bargain considering that other brands cost just as much for bargain basement features.  Sony's and Samsung's 32 inchers are roughly the same price but only offer 720p at a poorer contrast ratio.  If you hope to use this as a part-time computer monitor like me, then the 1080p and high contrast ratio make a big difference.Overall for the price, features, and quality, I am very happy with this tv.

Reviews.Title: A Sound TV Investment!
Reviews.Author: nessie
Reviews.Content: Just set my TV up this week.  So easy it amazed me.Like others, I'd researched TVs to death (for the last couple of years) and this was on my "short list". I waited for one of my preferred TVs to hit the price point I was willing to pay for it.I'm not a fan of the shiny piano black edges on most HDTVs so, I was a bit put off as I unpacked this one and the edges seemed wider than I expected.  However, once the TV was all set up, I decided that compromising on the edges was a small price to pay for getting everything else I truly needed, plus a few key items I wanted.Primary selling points for me:  the LG reputation; excellent professional and user reviews; technical specs; and especially (1) sound leveling (so the commercials don't blast me out of the room) and (2) a swivel stand, so I can swing it toward guest seating when I have company in the living room (instead of just me in my comfy recliner).Happily, the remote control fits my hand nicely and seems easy to use.  It also had a couple of other features I love and didn't expect: (1) a channel return button (labeled "flashback") which takes you back to the previous channel, so you can easily flip between two channels; and (2) a mode button which switches you from one input to another without having to go into the menu (e.g.  from TV to DVR or Game mode).The TV sits in a corner between two floor-to-ceiling windows.  With the blinds open in bright sunshine, the picture was clear and distinct with vibrant colors.Since others have commented extensively on the all the other important details, I'll sum up by saying:If you're looking for an attractive, solid, basic HDTV with a good-excellent picture that's easy to set up and use ... go for it!  At the price point we saw for the Gold Box special (under $400), this was a no brainer.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Walter B. Graham
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to replace a 32" 720p HD that was about 4 yrs old. Extremely easy to set up. Worked perfectly, great picture. Great price!

Reviews.Title: ATSC Reception Excellent
Reviews.Author: Doug Lifer
Reviews.Content: For those of you connecting directly to an antenna, LG delivers. I was very concerned buying a new TV for my mom who is using a good inside antenna. She lives about 7-10 miles from transmitters in Philadelphia with lots of hills and multipath interference. She was using a "government free" converter box that had LG receiver chips. LG receiver chips are the best so I was hoping that LG used their own receivers on their TV. This LG TV does at least as well as the box with 38 channels.I have no idea how other TVs compare - doesn't seem like anyone rates ATSC performance so I'd stick with LG.

Reviews.Title: I love my new HDTV
Reviews.Author: Robert B. Burdo "Robert Burdo"
Reviews.Content: This is my first flat screen HDTV, and all I can say is Awesome picture quality, great price, and very easy to you. In my opinion Buy it now. It is great for the first time HDTV buyer.[...]

Reviews.Title: My new LCD HD TV
Reviews.Author: William Crans
Reviews.Content: This TV replaced an old 24" analog TV. Been very pleased with it so far. Price and service was very good. I was skeptical about buying a TV online but had absolutely no problems. The TV picture quality is stunning especially for sporting events. It is the perfect size for a small living room. Would definitely recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Color Monitoring
Reviews.Author: R. L. Rollo "Picsee Productions LLC"
Reviews.Content: I purchased the LG32LH30 TV to use with Final Cut Pro software and an Matrox mini to monitor NTSC video color output while editing in FCP.  The LG was selected for its 1:1 pixel capability, it rich color adjustment features and price.  The picture quality head-on is excellent, but it quickly becomes brighter and losses color quality when viewed from even a small side angle.  I have to make a point to be directly in front of the LCD when making color adjustments.  This could be a issue if used as a TV.  It is a good value for the price.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LH30
Reviews.Author: J. Wallace
Reviews.Content: Wow! This TV is excellent.  The picture is very clear and sharp.  Comcast HD is beautiful!  I bought this set from Amazon, and the first one I ordered was damaged in shipping.  That night, I filled out the return/exchange form and 2 days later I had a brand new working TV.  Amazon arranged return shipping, and the whole process was painless.  Now... the TV's picture is quite a bit better than I expected.  I didnt even NEED to calibrate to my liking as "out-of-the-box" settings were perfect.  The sound is normal for LCDs of this size, and you should find it more than adequate.  At this price, this TV is a steal.  I love it!  I would recommend to anybody.

Reviews.Title: Great Picture and Good Value
Reviews.Author: J. Harris
Reviews.Content: We've had this TV LG 32LH30 32-Inch 1080p LCD HDTV, Gloss Black for about 4 weeks and are very happy with it. It is in our bedroom armoire. We bought it when it was offered at a discount price of $380 with no tax and free shipping - a great value for a 32in 1080p TV.  The picture quality is great and the TV has a very easy to use Color Adjustment Wizard to fine tune the adjustments. We have a 8-9 year old big box Pioneer Elite 52in 1080i TV that has a very good HD picture, but the LG 32in is much sharper and brighter. My only complaint is the side viewing angle that washes out at about 20 degrees.  Overall we are very pleased with the picture quality and value of the TV.

Reviews.Title: A good 2 years
Reviews.Author: J. Shaw
Reviews.Content: Purchased TV Jan 2010 and used on average around 10 hrs a week.  Perfect TV for my needs - nice image, no real sound issues, nice features.  Jan 2012 I notice a thin horizontal line 2/3 from top of screen. Also another horizontal line -- but this is a difference in brightness about 1/3 from top of screen.  Since then it has gotten steadily worse and the screen is mostly black until the TV warms up.  Needless to say I'm not happy with a TV that only lasts 2 years (especially with another LCD TV brand in the house that is older and running just fine).  Seriously question buying an LG.  Or at the very least this specific model.

Reviews.Title: PIECE of JUNK
Reviews.Author: HateJunk
Reviews.Content: LG LCD TV  32LH30An absolute piece of junk.Purchased in November of 2009.  Used less than 25 hours, then had to leave town for almost 6 months.  On return, system dead.  LG replaced two modules under warranty.Used less than 5 hours, then had to leave town for another 6 + months.  On return - you guessed it, system dead and showing exactly the same symptoms as before.  You probably already know - system now out of warranty.  Something very strange with power supply - probably burning out the same module over and over again.No way that I am willing to pay one cent to try to have this beast repaired again.Everyone should also beware of the LG web site.  It purports to let us write product reviews.  Can tell you - if your review is the least bit critical it somehow gets lost and does not appear on their site.  An actual experience I had in reviewing this TV.

Reviews.Title: A satisfied customer
Reviews.Author: Madelyn A. Mccarthy
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this flat screen TV.  Received it within 3 days of ordering it.  Good picture quality, good sound, good TV for the price.

Reviews.Title: Good TV
Reviews.Author: Iowa Clones
Reviews.Content: Very easy to set up. Overall picture is very good and the sound is good for the room we have it in(medium sized living room). A good amount of features that are easy to use and to get to. When viewing from an angle the picture quality is still great. The color it gives to dvds and blu-rays is great. Overall great tv that we got for a great price.

Reviews.Title: Full Family Room!
Reviews.Author: K. Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for the family room slash toy room.The sound and picture are wonderful.  Once again I am very happy with an LG product.  The grandparents can use and readily see the remote buttons. The children are tickled with the clarity and larger screen with bright colors.  Disney, NICk and The Weather Channel have never looked so good.

Reviews.Title: Good TV for the money
Reviews.Author: theKGD
Reviews.Content: The TV meets or exceeds my expectations. My only complaint is that there is no analog audio out for hooking up to my theater system. It only has digital audio out.

Reviews.Title: I can't complain
Reviews.Author: K. Rutledge
Reviews.Content: I'm not a technological expert, but my boyfriend is and he said this was a good quality tv.  The picture,sound, etc. works well, and it is the best tv I've had thus far.

Reviews.Title: Great TV - update
Reviews.Author: Sassy52 "Sassy"
Reviews.Content: The TV arrived quickly and I love the picture and sound.  Easy to use.Update - it is now almost 3 years later and I'm still watching this TV.  Love it!

Reviews.Title: Picture zoom ?
Reviews.Author: Edward K
Reviews.Content: This set provides a great picture, and pricing from Amazon was superior to others.  The sound levels seem to be very low, even in a small room.  The problem I have is with not having direct access to the picture zoom functions like my Toshiba and Sony LCD sets, spoiled I guess.  Additionally, the zoom selections provide a picture that is either too large or too small, still very good, just not sized to fill the screen.

Reviews.Title: Overjoyed
Reviews.Author: Easy Writer
Reviews.Content: I am so happy with this TV, it met or beat my expectations in every category. Beautiful picture and a remote control that is very easy to use and understand. And with the great price I got at Amazon.com it was the perfect purchase after months of shopping around. I've had it several weeks now and I am still very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value

Reviews.Content: Great pictue and good sound without any extras.worked great right out of the box, no fooling around.

Reviews.Title: Smashing Tele
Reviews.Author: Valerie Stephens "Valerie"
Reviews.Content: After buying a Wii, and trying to hook it up to our old tele (not enough holes) it was decided a new tele must here. Next day this LG appeared as the deal of the day. Timing being what it is, I felt this was a good omen. Read the comments, sent the site to my son, feedback was all positive! Ordered the tele, it arrived in 5 days, brilliant. Hook up was a breeze, a real easy peasy. Changing from television to Wii games, 1 click. Picture quality, couldn't be happier. Very happy with the entire purchase, start to finish. Thanks

Reviews.Title: excellent product for price
Reviews.Author: J. Thompson
Reviews.Content: Very happy with tv. You never know exactly what you are getting unless you see it in a store but I was very happy with this impulse purchase. I am waiting for more bargains to enter my mailbox from Amazon. I did check the price and reviews on the web and I would definately buy again.

Reviews.Title: LG 32LH30 32 inch 1080p
Reviews.Author: Sunny Dey
Reviews.Content: The TV was great-clarity and screen is wonderful.  The price is great, too.  The first one came damaged from the box and they shipped one out immediately.  Amazon.com is a great website to buy products and they stand behind them when there is a problem.  Great Customer service which is fast and responds back to you quickly.  This TV is really great.  A clear picture and no problems with the second one.

Reviews.Title: Great item!
Reviews.Author: Great Kid
Reviews.Content: Gave this item as a gift to my mom and she loves it.  Great picture quality and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: This is a wonderful TV.  I purchased it during the Deal of the Day but would have paid full price.  The picture quality is great and set-up only took 5 minutes.

Reviews.Title: LG 32" 1080p
Reviews.Author: Charles C. Matthews
Reviews.Content: I bought this HD TV from Amazon for $380, a great value. The picture is tremendous for color, resolution, brightness, etc. The size is perfect for our bedroom. The remote is simple and intuitive. The features do not include channel labels, which would be helpful since I look at HD tv on the QAM tuner and not on a cable box. I use the favorites list to help remember that CBS is 53-3, NBC is 51-1, etc. The TV set has lots of various inputs to accept a variety of devices. I highly recommend the set.

Reviews.Title: Best bang for your buck!
Reviews.Author: James
Reviews.Content: Compared to other TVs at this price, this one is a treasure among trinkets. Most 32" flat-panels at this price are only 720p whereas this one is 1080p. Likewise, it's contrast ratio is much higher. The only negative thing I could say about it is that it only has the 60Hz refresh rate as opposed to the newer 120Hz and 240Hz technologies which eliminate a lot of motion blur. I would recommend this TV to anyone trying to balance quality with cost. Though if you have a higher budget, I'd definitely recommend opting for a more expensive one with 120Hz or 240Hz technology.

Reviews.Title: Love this TV
Reviews.Author: Nolan W. Stokes
Reviews.Content: The TV was shipped very quickly and arrived in great shape.  Set-up was a breeze and the picture is excellent.  I would buy this agian.

Reviews.Title: I think it rocks
Reviews.Author: J. Williams
Reviews.Content: There are some super nerdy types who give this TV a bad rating because they say it doesn't have a superior IPS panel.  Dude, it's a $400 32" 1080p TV!  It looks great, especially paired with a PS3 and Blu-Ray.  The sound is far superior to my older Samsung 26".  If you are looking for a quality 1080p set for a phenomenal price, this is it.  If you are a type-A videophile, not the TV for you.

Reviews.Title: AU OPTRONICS PANEL NOT IPS
Reviews.Author: Pen Name "Turk"
Reviews.Content: I received the TV today.Picture quality is inferior even to the cheapest no-name HDTVs. I looked through the vents behind the TV with the help of a flash light and found out that this TV has AUO panel made in Taiwan not IPS panel LG used to have.I am returning the TV ASAP. What a mistake...

Reviews.Title: excelente Televisor¡¡
Reviews.Author: Jonathan
Reviews.Content: Hice la compra de este Tv el 13 de marzo de este año; hasta la fecha me ha funcionado perfectamente, ademas cumple los requisitos tanto de imagen como de sonido, lo recomiendo ampliamente, excelente televisor.

Reviews.Title: Broken out of the box
Reviews.Author: Soma
Reviews.Content: Would have loved to have a good review to add...however, this TV was broken upon arrival. It turned on, but we couldn't get it past the white "power on" screen.  Contacting LG to troubleshoot confirmed that it needed to be fixed. Preferred to return instead of dealing with repairs on a supposedly brand new item. :(

Reviews.Title: Awesome TV for the price among competetion
Reviews.Author: S. Narayanan "Palputations"
Reviews.Content: This is a good Tv when compared to the Panasonic and Samsun of the 32" series model. I have used it for 3 weeks so far and it is awesome so far. I have it in my bedroom on a wall mount and great picture quality and also voice/sound quality. Typically in Samsung and Panasonice the sound is not that good.

Reviews.Title: Can beat this for the price
Reviews.Author: Jacob Y. Park "nothingyet"
Reviews.Content: 32 inches seems to be the magic size at which you can start to see the difference in quality between 720p and 1080p.  But that should only matter if you have a 1080p signal (Blueray, PS3, etc).This tv is priced the same (or less) than many 720p TVs of the same size.  In all honesty, I could not tell the difference between the picture quality of this TV and the one it replaced (the 32LH20), but I got it for about $40 cheaper!At first, I thought the picture quality of this set was actually worse.  But then I adjusted the picture settings and adjusted my set-top box.  This TV has a great picture.I have yet to try it out with 1080, but I'm sure it'll be amazing... in my humble opinion, LG has among the best quality displays out there for the price.It also gives me some leverage to convince my wife that we NEED a PS3... lol :)

Reviews.Title: This television is AWESOME! Color is fantastic and I bought a second one to use as a computer monitor.
Reviews.Author: John L. Gréten
Reviews.Content: I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a quality picture! This product is worth its weight in gold.

Reviews.Title: Excellent price/quality relation .
Reviews.Author: N. Armitano
Reviews.Content: Very happy with this TV set and the price I paid for it. Also the delivery service was correct and very fast.

Reviews.Title: Excellent LVD TV
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: This is a Good Quality TV if you'are loocking for a good LCD and Low Price this is wath you re loocking for, Sound, imge, Style, all is acording to de $$ that you are spending. No, Relly is more than you are buying, im very glad to have that TV.

Reviews.Title: PLEASE DO NOT PURCHASE
Reviews.Author: C. Hong
Reviews.Content: I purchased two sets, and both have had a problem. A black box appears on the screen (about 12x4 inches) and does not go away.There is a reason why this tv was DISCONTINUED.And I found a newer version of this tv for a $100 less(!!!) at Video Only.Save yourself the headache of trying to get a hold of a customer service representative to return the electronics, and then trying to communicate your situation to the service representative located in another country, etc. *Sigh.Rule #1: Do your homework. Some consumers think they're getting a great deal on online purchases. Online products and their prices aren't what they're cracked up to be sometimes.Good Luck & Happy Shopping!

Reviews.Title: happy buyer
Reviews.Author: J. cornish "jack c"
Reviews.Content: So far a great hdtv,buying experience was great as usual from amazon.com. my favorite site.

Reviews.Title: 32 inch hdtv
Reviews.Author: golf noni
Reviews.Content: Just got it.  Pretty easy to set up.  Love having it come to my door.  It works so far.  I am 75 yrs old and it is great shopping online at Amazon.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Jianhong Cui
Reviews.Content: This TV is great, so clear, I love it.The only problem is the remote control, it seems not sensitive enough, sometimes not response quickly. If LG could improve that, it will be perfect!

Reviews.Title: Excellent LCD
Reviews.Author: Jorge Leon Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: It is an excellent LCD and it have great features and technology. I think it will be better with an USB port.

Reviews.Title: Great price for a spare-room TV!
Reviews.Author: T. W. Bauer "TWayne"
Reviews.Content: I picked this TV up when it was around 50% off here and what an amazing buy!  Great picture quality, great size for a bedroom or spare room and great price.  It's very easy to set up and, as most TVs do now, it has a nice little interactive walk-through while getting started, which makes it easy for even those technologically challenged.  In all, I wouldn't use this as a main living-room set (unless I were in a tiny living room...) but it is great for anywhere else!

Reviews.Title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: Alan Bachmann
Reviews.Content: Picture quality is worse than my 9 year old rear projection tv.  Six months into owning it the speakers starting buzzing.  Customer service is an absolute joke.  I registered it with LG and customer service was still a pain.  It is still under warranty so we'll see how it goes.

Reviews.Title: categorizado con tres "B" : bueno, bonito y barato
Reviews.Author: Kuo-ping Wang
Reviews.Content: Un televisor LCD de muy buena calidad, la imagen es nitida, los colores se ven muy bien. Lo uso como monitor para mi computadora y no tiene ningun problema como me paso con el otro de la competencia (Toshiba) que salio borroso y la gente de soporte me decia que era problema de incompatibilidad, pero con este no pasa eso, la verdad una compra exelente, aparte la mas barata comparando con otros paises, aca en US se vende bien barato este televisor, cosa que deberia pasar en mi paises tambien ya que estan robando como 600 dolares alla, aca solo salio 400 y algo. asi que LG dejen de robar en mi pais y bajen los precios tambien!!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV at amazing price
Reviews.Author: Matthew Harrell
Reviews.Content: TV shipping extemely fast and was very easy to install. TV looks great and was the best deal out there. I highly recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: do not buy any LG tv
Reviews.Author: Dissatisfied Consumer
Reviews.Content: Don't buy LG TVs unles you plan on replacing them in 2-3 years.50" complete dead after 36 months, 32" remote sensor went after 14 monthsLG is NO HELP with service of out of warranty,  You don't matter at all!STAY AWAY FROM LG!!

Reviews.Title: Great Flat Panel 1080p LCD TV For The Price
Reviews.Author: E. A. DiGiacomo "Captain"
Reviews.Content: Bought this 32" LG TV for the benefit of being an AU OPTRONICS panel, for its obvious adjustability and being a 1080p. Another advantage this 1080p TV is very easy to calibrate and the picture wizard is exceptionally accommodating. The menu options are numerous as is the elegance of the LH30. The sound quality on this LG LH30 is in my opinion "enhanced quality" compared to other sets costing twice the amount. The paleness of whites is very good, colors don't wash out are very good and the set provides sufficient tools to tweak the picture for personal preference. Mid-tones are remarkably crisp and clear; black levels are deep and vibrant even at different angles, unusual for a LCD screen. Another advantage I noticed; no dead pixels on my LH30 which is remarkable for a TV in this price range. The swivel stand that comes with the TV does more than other sets costing four times the price, another nice feature from LG. I'm not a committed cinema/video enthusiast but I cannot foresee this TV will not fulfill most viewers who want a low priced midsized flat screen 1080p high definition TV. In my opinion this is the best 1080p flat screen TV you could buy for the money, paid $379.00 with free shipping from Amazon. The picture quality on this LG is absolutely extraordinary and incredibly easy to use and set up; I recommend the LG LH30 1080p flat screen TV to all.

Reviews.Title: I just ordered TV 3/12/10 and am worried after reading poor review
Reviews.Author: bj "bj"
Reviews.Content: I was excited about buying this TV but someone just entered a very poor review about cheap parts, etc. last Friday. The majority of reviews are positive, any input? I have not recd shipment yet.

Reviews.Title: Happy with TV, but not the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon electronic reviewer
Reviews.Content: I purchased the LG one week ago, and I am pleased with this TV.  Picture is quite sharp, and the sound quality is excellent for such a small set.  In addition, I am able to easily attach my computer using the HDMI connection in order to stream Netflix videos, somthing that never seemed to work properly on my prior TV, even though that one also had an HDMI connection.However, I was disappointed to see that just one week after purchasing the TV from Amazon for $524, the same TV was advertised in Best Buy for only $479.  I now feel quite foolish for having paid so much more than what is apparently the street price for this set.  I purchase products from Amazon due to their good reputation as well as low price, and I don't always expect to get the absolute lowest price, but in this case, the variance in price is quite high, and it is apparent I overpaid.  I will have to do more price comparison shopping in any future Amazon purchases, which I can do, but it is time consuming and I would prefer to shop at a place where I know that I am getting, if not the lowest price, at least a competitive price without having to check 30 different websites first.

Reviews.Title: I would not accept one of these sets if it was free
Reviews.Author: Marvel "captainmarvel"
Reviews.Content: The set-up paper pamphlet tells you nothing but how to put on the base and plug in the set.  The DVD instructions have 138 pages for you to print out.  The cabinet is reflective material that reflects even the faintest light in the room back from the set cabinet to the viewer and is a pain in the neck.  The hookup to the purchaser's existing sound system requires a special cable, not included, and nomenclature of the cable is not given.  The sound-out cable plugs into a 'laser' source on back of set, it is NOT an RCA plug-in.  The laser connector has to go into a laser receptacle on your system, and without the laser plug-in in your system, one must go and buy a new compatible sound system.  I think this set is over-designed for the price, it is good only as an 'extra' in a guest room where it is rarely watched or as a computer monitor, and is not for anyone who has any expectations beyond being able to watch it only when nothing else works or is available.

Reviews.Title: Nice for One Hour - New one still working - GREAT
Reviews.Author: Cape Cod Jack
Reviews.Content: (See update below)I bought this on a "one day sale"Good price for 32" High Def.Opened the box and noticed the strofoam packaging had been partially broken.Probably from being opened previously.Set up TV anyway.Worked well for one hour and completely shut down.No way of getting picture or sound back.Returned item (fast and easy)Replacement showed up. (styrofoam packaging broken, but not exactly as before)Set up TVWaiting.Will update in near future.Update: 3/09/2010Replacement TV is working well so I have upgraded from One-Star to Three-Star.Will increase rating to Four-Star if this set keeps working well.Update 4/24/2010Replacement TV is still going strong.  Turned out to be a good deal.Very impressed with Amazon replacement of original TV set.Strongly recommend this TV @ $350 - $400 price.
